snippet: The Vail International Dance Festival in Colorado includes performances ranging from ballet to street.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay Critic's Notebook applauds Vail International Dance Festival, open-air festival celebrating its 25th anniversary in Vail, Colo; says festival, which includes performances ranging from ballet to street, abounds in historic, daring and once-only conjunctions, partnerships and experiments.
lead_paragraph: The Vail International Dance Festival in Colorado includes performances ranging from ballet to street.

headline.print_headline: An Open-Air Stage For Feet and Wings
headline.seo: The Vail International Dance Festival Turns 25
headline.main: An Open-Air Stage for Feet and Wings
